home-page.hero-content: Iâ€™m a developer who still feels the excitement of running the first "Hello World" code. I thrive on solving challenges and bringing creativity to every stage of the software development process. I focus on both technical excellence and visual harmony in my projects. On my website, you can find more information about my projects and myself, and feel free to take a look at my CV for further details.
home-page.about-text: With a degree in Management Information Systems from Trakya University, I combine technical expertise with a solid understanding of business processes. In addition to my proficiency in frameworks like Spring Boot and Next.js, I excel in building strong communication with teams and clients, fostering collaboration and efficient problem-solving. I also have a good grasp of DevOps tools, which helps me deliver scalable and reliable solutions. I am open to freelance opportunities and eager to contribute to innovative projects across various industries.

experiences.description: Designed and developed user interfaces for web applications using Next.js and React. Worked closely with backend developers to integrate frontend components with Spring Boot APIs. Implemented responsive designs and optimized frontend performance. Managed CI/CD processes to streamline deployment and ensure continuous delivery. Contributed to the development of an ERP application, enhancing its functionality and scalability.

projects.title: Marketa E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Marketa is an e-commerce project I developed using a microservices architecture. In this project, I aimed to utilize microservices in a detailed and efficient manner. It allowed me to understand the requirements of a comprehensive e-commerce system and anticipate potential future challenges.

projects.title: Fullstack Veterinary Clinic Management System
projects.description: The comprehensive management system I developed for veterinary clinics provided me with valuable experience in creating software tailored to an organization's needs. This project optimized processes such as inventory management, accounting tasks, animal treatment records, and new animal registrations for veterinarians. Additionally, I designed a user-friendly experience enabling pet owners to easily track their pets' health and treatment progress through the system. With this project, I aimed to enhance both functionality and user experience, ultimately improving the operational efficiency of a real-world organization.

projects.title: Portfolio Website
projects.description: A portfolio website designed to showcase my projects and skills. This project was created to build my personal brand and effectively communicate with potential employers.

projects.title: Netflix Clone
projects.description: The Netflix clone project I developed is a feature-rich web application that allows users to save their favorite movies in personalized lists and access them seamlessly across devices. The project includes user registration, login, and cookie-based authentication processes; it also integrates third-party login features via Google and GitHub. To enhance visual appeal, I used Tailwind CSS to design modern, animated components and ensured a mobile-responsive layout. With the addition of a streaming feature, the platform offers a complete entertainment experience. This project provided me with the opportunity to experiment with new technologies, giving me confidence in utilizing them effectively in future projects.

projects.title: Fullstack Event Management Web Application
projects.description: The event management application I developed is a comprehensive platform that allows users to register, create events, and join existing ones. I designed a user-friendly interface for event creation and participant management. On the backend, I ensured secure handling of authentication and data processing to protect user information. By seamlessly integrating frontend and backend technologies, I built a robust and reliable system. This project was focused on demonstrating my technical expertise while serving as an impressive addition to my portfolio.
